title.narrative: NEW EVIDENCE GENERATION AND ANALYSIS

description.narrative: By 2017, national and regional authorities have developed capacities to updating policies based on evidence, formulation and monitoring public budgets for the restitution of the rights of adolescents living in conditions of violence and major social exclusion, with focus on results based management., which contributes to Birth Registration, Building Capacity For Evaluation, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Data And Child Protection, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Public Finance And Local Governance, Skills Development, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017, children and adolescents in conditions of greater exclusion in 24 prioritized municipalities have capacities and opportunities for their development, and have equitable access to services for the prevention and response to violence in its various manifestations.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, national and regional authorities have developed capacities to updating policies based on evidence, formulation andmonitoring public budgets for the restitution of the rights of adolescents living in conditions of violence and major socialexclusion, with focus on results based management.

description.narrative: With UNICEF support, the IML and the GRACCS led processes linked to strengthening capacities and developing systems for gathering and analyzing child-related data and indicators. These include generating evidence through studies that reflect violence against children and strengthening technical capacities in the analysis of data and indicators. | Status:Met | As-of Date:25/01/2019

actual.value: 2016:No progress. Significant Bottleneck. Negotiation to finalize AWP took a long time as new IP had to be identified.

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Existence of advocacy and engagement to place child poverty as a national priority

actual.value: 2016:On the supply side, while children are placed at the centre of the institutional interventions, child poverty isn't mentioned nor measured at the national level.
